name: Sandship
description:
What if Jack Sparrow never came back from Davy Jones' Locker? That was very unlikely but he would probably race with his ship! Inspired by this vision, we did a game where you can try to compete with other pirates in the desert. Don't forget to collect chests where you can find some interesting stuff for the se... desert king of course.

Controls:

W - forward

D - turn right

A - turn left

Space - use power-up

Backwards? Bruh, ships doesn't sail backwards!

Repository

https://github.com/Caedo/KenneyJam2019
